name: Dementia: World Fades
description:
Dementia: World Fades is a really short psychological horror game. GAME INFO

You will be walking on an endless hallway with unsettling pictures.  Gameplay around 3 minutes :) This game was made in less than 24 hours :)

What awaits you:

-  Genre: Psychological Horror;

 - You will walk on a hallway;

 - Look around to find the weird and unsettling pictures;

 - You will be accompanied by creepy music which conveys the effect of presence and plunges into madness.

CREDITS

Programming, Visuals, and Project made by Tudypie

Music: Everywhere at the end of time by The Caretaker
